```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)

make_url <- function(x, y) {
  paste0('<a href="', tb %>% filter(logo %in% x) %>% slice(match(logo, x)) %>% pull(link), '">', y, '</a>')
}

tb <- read_csv('pkgs.csv') %>% 
  mutate(
    logo = paste0('hexes/hex_', name, '.png'),
    .after = name
  )
```

# Packages on CRAN:

```{r cran}
tb %>% 
  filter(status == 'CRAN') %>% 
  select(logo, info) %>% 
  gt(id = 'crantable') %>% 
  text_transform(
    locations = cells_body(columns = logo),
    fn = function(x) {
      make_url(x, y = 
                 local_image(
                   filename = x,
                   height = 100
                 )
      )
    }
  ) %>%
  tab_options(
    column_labels.hidden = TRUE
  ) %>% 
  cols_width(
    logo ~ px(125)
  ) %>% 
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(weight = 'bold'),
    locations = cells_body(columns = info)
  ) #%>% 
  #gt::gtsave(filename = 'tabs/cran.html')
```

# Packages on GitHub:

```{r github}
tb %>% 
  filter(status == 'GitHub') %>% 
  select(logo, info) %>% 
  gt(id = 'githubtable') %>% 
  text_transform(
    locations = cells_body(columns = logo),
    fn = function(x) {
      make_url(x,
               local_image(
                 filename = x,
                 height = 100
               )
      )
    }
  ) %>%
   tab_options(
     column_labels.hidden = TRUE
  ) %>% 
  cols_width(
    logo ~ px(125)
  ) %>% 
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(weight = 'bold'),
    locations = cells_body(columns = info)
  ) #%>% 
  #gt::gtsave(filename = 'tabs/github.html')
```
